content: You must accept cookies in TB (not browser) Settings/Privacy & Security.
creator: sfhowes

content:
Try this:

- go to TB menu > Settings > General 

- scroll all the way down and click the 'Config editor' button on the right 
- click 'Accept the risk and continue' 
- search for accessibility.force_disabled > change the value to 1 > click the check mark 
- restart TB
creator: siffemoz

content: You could report it as a possible bug.
creator: siffemoz

content: Hi, I has just reappeared, by deselecting and re-selecting View -> Toolbars -> Status Bar Xavier
creator: xavier7

content: If you want to receive emails on your PC and mobile and read them on both devices, you will need to use IMAP on all of your devices. POP should only be used if you only want to access your emails on a single device.
creator: bbonacci
